namechrome.message: 適用於 Google Chrome 的 Zoom

namefirefox.message: 適用於 Firefox 的 Zoom

nameopera.message: 適用於 Opera 的 Zoom

nameedge.message: 適用於 Microsoft Edge 的 Zoom

namesafari.message: 適用於 Safari 的 Zoom

description.message: 使用 Zoom 和鼠標滾輪放大或縮小網頁內容，以使閱讀更加舒適。 以百分比值表示。

donatepromotext.message: 如果你可以贊助我，不管金額多還是少，我都會非常感激！

textfoot.message: 此軟體的授權方式遵守 CC-GNU GPL。查看或複製該授權，見

desallzoom.message: 套用縮放等級到所有頁面

ratetitle.message: 請對我的擴展進行評價

ratedes.message: 和讓大家都知道這個特別好的擴展！

areyouhappy.message: 你在 Zoom 用的開心嗎？

titeldownloadaaupgrade.message: 升級增加了對聚焦所選影像的支援,並會顯示網站上的畫廊。

titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.message: 添加回 Google 網站上的黑色功能表。

titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.message: This shows you the real time stock market information.

titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.message: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.

titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.message: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. When you click on the icon, it shows you the current time; month and day of the week.

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

showremember.message: It doesn't show the reminder page when I open the Options

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

descontextmenu.message: Enable the right click menu to zoom in or out the web page

desbadge.message: Show the current zoom value in the Zoom Extension icon

deszoomsteps.message: The zoom steps for the next value

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Zoom browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Zoom extension in your web browser.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

sharetexta.message: Get this Cool Zoom browser extension

sharetextb.message: Hey, this is amazing! I tried the Zoom browser extension just today.

sharetextc.message: The Best and Amazing Zoom browser extension

sharetextd.message: Zoom' browser extension is the Best Tool for a perfect zoom level on the current page. Download it now and try it yourself!

deszoomdoubleclick.message: Double click to zooms in and a single click to zooms out the web page

deszoommousescroll.message: Hold the 'mouse button', and scroll up or down to change the zoom level

deslargepopup.message: Show you a large popup window

titleshortzoomin.message: Zoom in on the current web page

titleshortzoomout.message: Zoom out on the current web page

titleshortzoomreset.message: Reset the zoom value on the current web page

titleshortzoommagnify.message: Show the magnifying glass on the current web page

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

desremrate.message: If you like Zoom™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

deszoomfont.message: Change only the font size on that web page

deszoomsingleclick.message: The single-click action to open the popup window

deszoomnewsingleclick.message: The single-click action to see the magnify glass and double click to open the popup window

desapplyzoomreset.message: Apply reset zoom value to all tabs

titlezoomstylec.message: Custom preset zoom values for that specific domain

wpermissionnotremoved.message: The permissions have already been removed

permissionoption.message: Permission must be enabled to use this feature.

desyoutube.message: Discover and learn more about Stefan's browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Zoom! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

permissionactivetab.message: This will only manage the zoom of the web page on the currently open tab page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This to add all the Zoom percentage level in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This is to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

permissionwebnavigation.message: This is needed to instantly set the zoom value on the current web page before the web page loaded.

permissiontabs.message: This is needed for the following features: to show you the welcome and guide page, manage the zoom on all the open tabs, and to open the Options page.

permissionallurl.message: This to control the Z button on all websites that include http, https, file, and ftp.

domainexist.message: Domain already exists in the list.

permissionsystemdisplay.message: This is to get the current screen resolution.

desprezoombutton.message: Show your predefined zoom levels below the slider

designoreset.message: Ignore resets to this value when using the browser's built-in zoom engine

desinfobrowserbuiltin.message: The feature affects the entire page and scales everything uniformly, including text, images, and other elements.

desinfocss.message: The feature to scale an element and its children. It scales that element and its children relative to their original sizes within the document flow.

desinfofontsize.message: The feature that will change only the text size and not the images.

deszoomoutdoubleclick.message: Double click to zooms out and a single click to zooms in the web page
